Keywords: Avengers , Champions , S.H.I.E.L.D. , Spider-Man Family , Ultimates
Real Name: Miles Morales
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated
DIMENSIONAL TRAVEL WATCH: Spider-Man may start the game with [SVC] #s003 Dimensional Watch equipped (at no cost).
A SLIGHTLY DIFFERENT GENETICALLY ENGINEERED SPIDER: Plasticity, Sidestep, Stealth.
SHOCKING WEB BLAST: Precision Strike. // When Spider-Man is given a MOVE action and moves 5 squares or less, after resolutions he may make a range attack using Incapacitate and may target all opposing characters within range and line of fire, but must give action tokens.

July 13, 2021
nlegore
ERRATA: SHOCKING WEB BLAST: Precision Strike. // When Spider-Man is given a MOVE action and moves 5 squares or less, after resolutions he may make a range attack using Incapacitate and may target all opposing characters within range and line of fire, but must give action tokens.
December 25, 2020
highholyme
Just realized that him having Ultimates takes care of most IM issues with other Spider-peoples. Aside from that, this is the Miles i've been waiting for; accurate, cheap ($), at a fair point cost. Plays like he should but still differently than Peter or Gwen.
October 3, 2020
mc268
Finally, a great, accurate miles at a low rarity and low cost. Wow did they make up for the past version with this dial. He can get the watch for free, he has great stats (I even appreciate the mid dial defence slump, and end dial attack/damage slump) He has every power that I can see Miles getting, him always having a move and do something option is awesome, I like the special speed power a lot, and charge/super strength when he doesn’t have it is really cool. The dial does a good job of showing a strong Spider character who’s still learning the ropes a little. Now to talk about the main appeal, that special attack power, it’s nuts, precision strike and incap everyone within 4 and line of fire if you move 5 squares or less, wow. It’s especially terrifying on his first click, in my last game, he had the watch, so he side stepped, outwitted someone’s shape change, phased 5, then hit 5 characters with incap, then to cap it all off, brought in Scarlet Spider to do some damage with the other part of the watch trait. He also has stealth busting outwit, truly an Ultimate Spider-Man After some bad, and perplexing versions, they gave us an awesome, accessible love letter to the character.

I'd die for a Peter Parker: Ultimate Spider-Man title character
